items.sentence: By the time I got there to pick Tom up, he was more than ready to leave.
Tom's childhood might've been happier if his parents had stayed married.
You should expect this kind of thing to happen more often in the future.
Tom lives further away from school than Mary does, but closer than John.
A flight attendant was rescued from the wreckage of the passenger plane.
Tom woke up in the night with a burning pain in the middle of his chest.
Tom regrets not having gotten on better with his brother over the years.
Tom sent Mary a text message telling her he wanted to break up with her.
Do you think that anyone else in your office will get married this year?
I suspect Tom and Mary probably didn't do what they were supposed to do.
